globalHeaders.content-security-policy: default-src 'self' https:; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com; img-src 'self' data: https: http: https://drive.google.com https://images.unsplash.com; font-src 'self' https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com;
